dct_title_s: World distribution of spirochetal diseases: 1.Yaws, pinta, bejel
dct_description_sm: American Geographical Society of New York. Briesemeister elliptical equal-area projection. On upper right margin: Atlas of distribution of diseases - plate 15. Maps: 1. Yaws and bejel : [world] -- 2. Pinta : [Latin America] -- 3a. Haiti : disease prevalence relative to 500 meter contour line -- 3b. Haiti : geology and temperature -- 3c. Haiti : natural vegetation and rainfall -- 4a. Guadalcanal : disease prevalence relative to 500 meter contour line -- 4b. Guadalcanal : geology and temperature -- 4c. Guadalcanal : natural vegetation and rainfall -- 5a. Thailand : disease prevalence relative to 500 meter contour line -- 5b. Thailand : soils and temperature -- 5c. Thailand : natural vegetation and rainfall. Verso: Basic sources.
dct_publisher_sm: New York, NY : American Geographical Society, 1955.
